name: Terramon: Demo
description:
Step into the world of Terramon, where you can tame a variety of cute and powerful creatures! Team Havoc is spreading trouble and it's up to the Tamer Guild to stop them. Catch Terramon and fight the agents of chaos before they achieve their goals! Be careful, though, because some of your Terramon's skills are a little chaotic.. 

Assemble the perfect team and battle your way to the top!  Meet some of the creatures you can tame!

 

Eyegle - This little eagle is impulsive and rash but is sure to support you! Recommended if you like fast action. Eyegle's skills are mostly Speed based.


Geeko - This cute little lizard might not look it, but has a very high IQ. Recommended for those who like to think and plan out their actions. Geeko's skills are tech based.

Alligrater - This tough little gator might be difficult to train. But once he warms up to you he'll be a powerful ally! Alligrater specializes in physical attacks.

So what are you waiting for? The Terra Guild awaits!!
